case.name: Call and response
case.description: Maki seems in a good mood since she is winning, so she decided to do a call and response like she used to do when she was a school idol.

case.name: Believing in Santa
case.description: Apparently, Maki still believes in Santa Claus.

case.name: Piano
case.description: Maki ask everyone else if they play musical instruments.

case.name: Future Doctor
case.description: Maki tells that she is willing to reply to some medicine questions.

case.name: Food
case.description: Maki ask everyone about their favorite food.
